title: ANZOME Bike Seat Cushion, Wide Foam & Extra Soft Gel Exercise Bike Seat Cushion for Women Men Everyone, Compatible with Cruiser, Stationary Bike, Exercise Bike, Fit Wide 8.5-10in(Rain Cover Included)
features: ✅The Wide Gel Soft Pad Comfortable Exercise Bicycle Saddle Cover is a must-have item for your exercise bike, and you will enjoy riding even more and stay healthy with it.

✅COMFORT YOU CAN TRUST - Wide Foam & Extra Soft Gel Bike Seat Cushion ensure that working out on your bike will be comfortable. ANZOME stationary bike seat cushion padded by eco-friendly transparent silica gel and high-density milky foam. No harm to health, Unlike cheap bike seat cover. Effectively absorb the shock and reduce pain. Be better protection for your butt.

✅GEL BIKE SEAT COVER - The Bike Seat Cushion is "butt" saver! Perfect to be used as your exercise bike seat cushion or cycling seat cover. The comfy bicycle seat cushion size is 11.81 x 10.63 x 2 inches (L*W*H). Fit for the width of bicycle seat in the range of 8.5-10 inches. Fit great with Upright bike, Spin Class, Exercise bike, Stationary bike, Cruiser, Electric bike, and use for an outdoor bike seat. We recommend you double-check the size of your saddle before ordering a bicycle seat cushion

✅NON-SLIP DESIGN - The bike seat cover is in anti-skid leather and with draw-string and 4 extra straps to keep the padded bicycle seat cover stay still on the seat. No any other tools are needed. Simply put the exercise bike seat cover over the seat and secure the draw-string and straps. If you are looking for must-have indoor cycling accessories or stylish cruiser bike accessories, this cover is perfect to be used as your indoor cycling seat cushion or as a comfy beach cruiser gel seat cover.

✅PREPARE FOR RAINY DAYS - The surface of this padded bike seat cushion is Lycra fabric, moisture absorption, fast dry, comfortable, and breathable. Breathable airflow vent in the middle for heat-dissipation, keep buttock cool & dry, make private parts no pressure. Included a rain cover with our comfortable bike seat, protecting your bicycle seat from rain & dew. So you can exercise in any weather! Satisfy your cycling experience!

✅PROFESSIONAL QUALITY - There is an air diversion slot design in the middle of the stationary bike seat cushion, it can speed up air circulation, keep the buttock cool & breathable, and make private parts no pressure. If you find that you are unsatisfied with this gel cushion for a bike seat, please do not hesitate to reach out to us! Customer comfort and happiness are our top priority!
description: The ANZOME Bike Saddles is "butt" saver!

Latest Soft Comfy Bike Seat Without Any ‘Saddle Sores’, You owe to yourself!  This gel bicycle seat cover fits medium to large size bicycle seats and exercise bikes. Slips over existing seat in seconds!  Add that extra comfort you need. Deluxe Gel cushion, Non slip bottom for stability, Locking Drawstring for snug fit and easy removal.  - Made of professional sport foam, the ANZOME bike seat is of good elasticity, toughness, larger endurance. Human-Being Design; No Numbness Any More -Long nose transits to seat bottom smoothly and naturally, reducing leg mobility and flexibility. Air Ventilation Ensures and Fresh Riding Experience! - Airflow design in middle accommodates circulation of buttock and speed up the air flowing and heat-dissipation.
